name: Blackcliff Agate
desc: A mysterious catalyst made of blackstone. It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.
skill_desc: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
